page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In Durness full time employment is hard to come by,causing many young people to leave. There is a great deal of seasonal employment during the summer due to tourism. Several men have more than one part time job and family incomes can be supplemented by keeping sheep or doing bed and breakfast. The following list is based upon the employment of the parents of the school children. shop assistant hotel worker teacher tapestry worker hand knitter fisherman shop keeper civil engineer ferryman fencer farm worker builder shepherd roadman joiner crofter woodturner district nurse bookbinder home help farm manager band player
